body:
Comment 3 by **james.keane**: 
Please see src/Main.inc line 102.

LD is set to the go linker.

A sample use that I am using it for is to link a multi package build for testing, so
that before installation it uses the proper imports.

This brings up another issue with gotest, being that GL can't have linker arguments in
it, it expects GL to be a file. (hence the shell script attached)

I will attach a Makefile and the work around I am using.

But notice that running make will compile using the proper extra linking instructions,
but just gotest needs the work around.
Attachments: 1. go_test_link_hack.sh (187 bytes) 1. Makefile (519 bytes)
